summary: Adds a basement with Forge area, Alchemy / Enchant area, as well as (fully working) Mannequins!
descriptionHtml:
[font=Georgia]Hello Nexus People! Delta back here again with another Breezehome mod!

Adds a new basement to the Breezehome Player home.

No need to purchase anything![/font]

[font=Georgia][size=5][u][i][b]Forge Area[/b][/i][/u][/size][/font][font=Georgia] (to the left after going down the stairs)
[/font]
[font=Georgia]Adds: Skyforge, Tanning rack, Smelter, Grindstone, and an Armor table.[/font]

[font=Georgia][u][i][b][size=5]Alchemy and Enchant Area[/size][/b][/i][/u][size=3] [size=2][font=Georgia](to the right after going down the stairs)[/font][/size][/size][/font]

[font=Georgia]Adds: Alchemy Lab, Arcane Enchanter, Farm (Includes most of, if not all vanilla ingredients)

[size=5][u][i][b]Main Basement Area
[/b][/i][/u][size=2]Adds: 5 Mannequins, Lights and Effects

[youtube]6p43IDZ4AF8[/youtube]

[size=4][b]Lights and Effects:[/b][/size][/size][/size][/font]
[font=Georgia]effects used are in-game Shout Models
Lights were set up by me. A lot of testing was done since they were my first lights I worked on.[size=5][size=4][u][i][b]
[/b][/i][/u][b]**Warnings**[/b][u][i][b]
[/b][/i][/u][font=Arial][size=2][b]-DO NOT use with other Breezehome mods
-Remove ALL items from containers before removing this mod[/b][/size][/font][u][i][b]
Credits![/b][/i][/u][/size][size=2][i][b]
[/b][/i]Bethesda - For making this amazing game!
DeltaLightSoul (me) - For making this not-so-amazing mod!
Amaterasu (also me) - Same as above.[/size][/size][/font]
author: Amaterasu and DeltaLightSoul
